PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.Name: PF_Movement_Terrestrial_Base
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.label: terrestrial
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.description: Adapted for land, these creatures navigate solid terrains with ease. While they can wade through shallow waters, deeper expanses prove challenging.

PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.label: aquatic
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.description: Aquatic creatures swim effortlessly through all bodies of water. However, they find themselves out of their element on land.

PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.label: amphibious
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.description: Equally at home in water and on land, these versatile creatures transition seamlessly between aquatic and terrestrial environments.

PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.label: driller
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.description: Subterranean navigators, these creatures burrow through soil and sand. However, they steer clear of rocky terrains and water surfaces.

PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.label: digger
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.description: Specialized for rapid movement beneath the surface, these creatures excel in sand and soil. On other terrains, they move similarly to their terrestrial counterparts.

PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.label: flying
PathfindingFramework.MovementDef.description: Soaring above obstacles, these creatures have the skies as their domain, hovering gracefully over most landscapes.
